carl.abr.utils

Class File_RW

  • java.lang.Object
    • carl.abr.utils.File_RW

  • public class File_RW
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to read and write into files.

    • Method Detail

      • write_file

        public static void write_file(Context context,
              java.lang.String file,
              java.lang.String text,
              boolean append_mode)
        Writes text into a file.
        Parameters:
        context - : context of the parent calling this function
        file - : name of the file to be modified or created
        text - : text (data) to write in the file
        append_mode - : true if text to be added at the end of an existing file, false to create a new file (and replace existing one)

      • reset_file

        public static void reset_file(Context context,
              java.lang.String file)
        Deletes and recreates an empty file with the same name.
        Parameters:
        context - : context of the parent calling this function
        file - : name of the file to be re-created

      • read_file

        public static java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> read_file(Context context,
                                           java.lang.String file)
        Reads a file and output a list (Vector) of Strings containing the data.
        Parameters:
        context - : context of the parent calling this function
        file - : name of the file to be read
        Returns:
        Vector containing the data read from the file
